about_the_game:
Welcome to Inkwell Paper, where that soulless office job you hate despises you just as much! It's all your fault for sneaking in video games during work hours, and now you've got a mountain of overdue tasks to tackle before the sun rises. In "Office Overtime," your one true ally is the sweet aroma of fresh coffee.

Step into the shoes of a restless employee in this point-and-click experience that will have you questioning reality and immerse yourself in "Office Overtime," where you'll experience the killer dream job you've been dying for. Can you survive the night? The coffee's brewing, and the clock is ticking!

Features

  • Easy mechanics
  • Intuitive user interface
  • Mini-games
  • Thrilling gameplay
  • Atmospheric environment

Gameplay

Office Overtime is a point-and-click horror game set in a late 90s office. You play as an employee with severe sleep deprivation, being forced to work overtime. During this shift you must catch up with overdue work, including several different tasks that keep the work interesting to the player. Every night has new tasks and new surprises in store. Completing these tasks won't be so easy though... You, the player, aren't alone in the office so make sure you check your surroundings regularly. On top of that, you are rapidly falling asleep, so make sure to keep drinking that coffee!

name: Office Overtime

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change in future updates.

short_description: That soulless office job you hate? It hates you too, playing video games during work hours was your fault. Catch up on overdue work before morning. Coffee is your best friend.
